name: Flyboard: Water Hoverboard Stunt Simulator 3D Full
name_original: Flyboard: Water Hoverboard Stunt Simulator 3D Full
description:
Dreamed to be a pilot of some unusual device like flyboard? Then this wonderful water stunt simulator is made exactly for you! Perform different tricks and enjoy the flight above the fish with Flyboard: Water Hoverboard Stunt Simulator 3D!
Tame the wave with that unusual ski-like water jetpack and have this wonderful feeling of extreme ride! Hurtle through the air, tumble, dive and whirl doing this wonderful modern sport! Put the air stream under your supervision and explore the wide open spaces of the World Ocean!
Drive your flyboard at dizzy speed, enjoy bird’s eye views and have fun! Check two game modes – freeride mode, where you should stay in the air as long as possible; and contest mode, where you should do your best and collect the stars and checkpoints during your swift flight!
Earn points for successfully done contests and missions to unlock new types of hoverboards or new interesting locations to investigate! Become the world champion of this unusual water sport in Flyboard: Water Hoverboard Stunt Simulator 3D!
Flyboard: Water Hoverboard Stunt Simulator 3D features:
• Ultimate water flyboard simulator
• Check two game mods
• Interesting unlockable locations
• Realistic 3D graphics
Put on your special diving suit and feel the adrenaline of modern extreme sport with Flyboard: Water Hoverboard Stunt Simulator 3D!
